humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, two out of twenty-four assessed left axillary lymph nodes are positive for metastatic mammary carcinoma (AJCC pN2). This corresponds to N2 stage based on the new rules provided.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 2 out of 24 examined left axillary lymph nodes positive for metastatic mammary carcinoma (AJCC pN2). This indicates that the cancer has spread to 2-9 axillary lymph nodes, which corresponds to N2 stage.
